onboarding_characters_desc: Explore all your favorite characters from the Rick & Morty universe. Dive into their details, origins, and more!
onboarding_episodes_desc: Browse through every episode, relive the adventures, and discover episode-specific trivia.
onboarding_locations_desc: Travel across dimensions and planets. Learn about the unique locations featured in the show.
